definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Click on the little eye icon on the left hand side of the ‘Background’ layer so it makes this particular layer invisible.
sentences.chinese: 单击背景图层左边的眼睛图标，这样能使它不可见。

sentences.english: A handy cam icon is displayed on slides generated using FMR.
sentences.chinese: 使用FMR产生的幻灯片，会显示手持摄像机图标。

sentences.english: The icon for the file should now be the special "UDL" icon.
sentences.chinese: 该文件的图标，现在应该是特殊的“太元”图标。

sentences.english: The icon for the file should now be the special "UDL" icon.
sentences.chinese: 该文件的图标，现在应该是特殊的“太元”图标。

sentences.english: You can even drag them from the Call Pet flyout.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以从召唤宠物图标里拉它们出来。

sentences.english: When you fly over a primitive, an information icon appears.
sentences.chinese: 移动到一个原语上时，显示信息图标。

sentences.english: Use badging to convey status information in an unobtrusive manner.
sentences.chinese: 使用小图标来显示程序的状态信息。

sentences.english: Double-click the icon to view the contents of the disc.
sentences.chinese: 双击该图标来查看光盘内容。

sentences.english: You can point to an icon, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您可以指向一个图标。

sentences.english: Each icon corresponds to a 16x16 pixels image.
sentences.chinese: 每个图标都是一副16x16像素的图形。

sentences.english: This step also also ensures that the database icon is used as the bookmark icon.
sentences.chinese: 这个步骤还可以确保使用数据库图标作为书签图标。

sentences.english: This step also also ensures that the database icon is used as the bookmark icon.
sentences.chinese: 这个步骤还可以确保使用数据库图标作为书签图标。

sentences.english: Click on the current sorting icon.
Avoid the use of large text and icons.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用大号文本和图标。

sentences.english: It has a dark gray envelope icon.

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
